articles.description: Negotiations between the Phoenix Suns and star Deandre Ayton on an extension to his rookie contract have ended without a deal, sources told ESPN on Monday.
articles.content: Discussions on a rookie contract extension for Phoenix Suns center Deandre Ayton ended ahead of a Monday deadline with no agreement, perishing without the franchise ever honoring the 2018 No. 1 overa… [+3407 chars]

articles.title: Stunning Martin Guptill catch no help for Black Caps in T20 World Cup warm-up loss - Stuff.co.nz
articles.description: David Warner was sent packing first ball of the innings by a screamer, but Aussies recover to win a tight T20 World Cup warm-up match.
articles.content: An amazing catch by Martin Guptill, to dismiss David Warner first ball of the innings, wasnt enough to push the Black Caps to victory over Australia in their Twenty20 World Cup warm-up match in Abu D… [+3889 chars]
